name: Dragonscales
description: A sweet, slightly floral, dragonfruit medley with hints of raspberry and honeysuckle.
author: Silky

reviews.text: Excellent blend of fruits with a slight kiss of floral honeysuckle. The marshmallow adds some thickness and rounds off any harsh edges. Also really like that you used  cactus it really juices the fruits up. Excellent job and thanks for sharing
